sql.isNotEmpty: u.ERP_REPAIR_ORDER_ID in (select a.ERP_REPAIR_ORDER_ID from ERP_REPAIR_ORDER_DTL a where upper(a.PRD_NO) like upper('%'||#PRD_NO#||'%') and a.DEL_FLAG=0)
u.ERP_REPAIR_ORDER_ID in (select a.ERP_REPAIR_ORDER_ID from ERP_REPAIR_ORDER_DTL a where upper(a.PRD_NAME) like upper('%'||#PRD_NAME#||'%') and a.DEL_FLAG=0)
u.ERP_REPAIR_ORDER_ID in (select a.ERP_REPAIR_ORDER_ID from ERP_REPAIR_ORDER_DTL a where upper(a.PRD_SPEC) like upper('%'||#PRD_SPEC#||'%') and a.DEL_FLAG=0)

sqlMap.sql:
select u.ERP_REPAIR_ORDER_ID, u.ERP_REPAIR_ORDER_NO, u.REPAIR_CHANN_ID, u.REPAIR_CHANN_NO, u.REPAIR_CHANN_NAME, u.AREA_ID, u.AREA_NO, u.AREA_NAME, to_char(u.REQ_FINISH_DATE,'yyyy-MM-DD') REQ_FINISH_DATE, u.STOREOUT_STORE_ID, u.STOREOUT_STORE_NO, u.STOREOUT_STORE_NAME, u.STORAGE_FLAG, u.REMARK, u.CRE_NAME, u.CREATOR, to_char(u.CRE_TIME,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') CRE_TIME, u.UPD_NAME, u.UPDATOR, to_char(u.UPD_TIME,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') UPD_TIME, u.DEPT_ID, u.DEPT_NAME, u.ORG_ID, u.ORG_NAME, u.LEDGER_ID, u.LEDGER_NAME, u.STATE, u.DEL_FLAG, u.SHIP_POINT_ID, u.SHIP_POINT_NAME, u.DELIVER_ADDR_ID, u.DELIVER_ADDR_NO, u.DELIVER_DTL_ADDR, (select sum(NVL(d.TOTAL_VOLUME,0)) TOTAL_VOLUME from ERP_REPAIR_ORDER_DTL d where d.ERP_REPAIR_ORDER_ID=u.ERP_REPAIR_ORDER_ID and d.DEL_FLAG=0)TOTAL_VOLUME
from ERP_REPAIR_ORDER u
sqlMap.select: select count(0) cnt FROM ERP_REPAIR_ORDER u
sqlMap.insert: insert into ERP_REPAIR_ORDER( ERP_REPAIR_ORDER_ID, ERP_REPAIR_ORDER_NO, REPAIR_CHANN_ID, REPAIR_CHANN_NO, REPAIR_CHANN_NAME, AREA_ID, AREA_NO, AREA_NAME, REQ_FINISH_DATE, STOREOUT_STORE_ID, STOREOUT_STORE_NO, STOREOUT_STORE_NAME, STORAGE_FLAG, STATE, REMARK, CREATOR, CRE_NAME, CRE_TIME, UPD_NAME, UPDATOR, UPD_TIME, DEPT_ID, DEPT_NAME, ORG_ID, ORG_NAME, LEDGER_ID, LEDGER_NAME, DEL_FLAG, DELIVER_ADDR_ID, DELIVER_ADDR_NO, DELIVER_DTL_ADDR )values( #ERP_REPAIR_ORDER_ID#, #ERP_REPAIR_ORDER_NO#, #REPAIR_CHANN_ID#, #REPAIR_CHANN_NO#, #REPAIR_CHANN_NAME#, #AREA_ID#, #AREA_NO#, #AREA_NAME#, to_date(#REQ_FINISH_DATE#,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), #STOREOUT_STORE_ID#, #STOREOUT_STORE_NO#, #STOREOUT_STORE_NAME#, #STORAGE_FLAG#, #STATE#, #REMARK#, #CREATOR#, #CRE_NAME#, sysdate, #UPD_NAME#, #UPDATOR#, sysdate, #DEPT_ID#, #DEPT_NAME#, #ORG_ID#, #ORG_NAME#, #LEDGER_ID#, #LEDGER_NAME#, #DEL_FLAG#, #DELIVER_ADDR_ID#, #DELIVER_ADDR_NO#, #DELIVER_DTL_ADDR# )
sqlMap.update:
update ERP_REPAIR_ORDER
REPAIR_CHANN_ID = #REPAIR_CHANN_ID# REPAIR_CHANN_NO = #REPAIR_CHANN_NO# REPAIR_CHANN_NAME = #REPAIR_CHANN_NAME# AREA_ID = #AREA_ID# AREA_NO = #AREA_NO# AREA_NAME = #AREA_NAME# STOREOUT_STORE_ID = #STOREOUT_STORE_ID# STOREOUT_STORE_NO = #STOREOUT_STORE_NO# STOREOUT_STORE_NAME = #STOREOUT_STORE_NAME# REQ_FINISH_DATE = to_date(#REQ_FINISH_DATE#,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') REMARK = #REMARK# ERP_REPAIR_ORDER_NO = #ERP_REPAIR_ORDER_NO# UPD_NAME = #UPD_NAME# UPDATOR = #UPDATOR# UPD_TIME = sysdate STATE = #STATE#
DELIVER_ADDR_ID = #DELIVER_ADDR_ID# DELIVER_ADDR_NO = #DELIVER_ADDR_NO# DELIVER_DTL_ADDR = #DELIVER_DTL_ADDR#
where ERP_REPAIR_ORDER_ID = #ERP_REPAIR_ORDER_ID#
sqlMap.delete: update ERP_REPAIR_ORDER set DEL_FLAG = #DEL_FLAG# ,UPD_NAME=#UPD_NAME# ,UPDATOR=#UPDATOR# ,UPD_TIME=sysdate where ERP_REPAIR_ORDER_ID = #ERP_REPAIR_ORDER_ID:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.select: select u.ERP_REPAIR_ORDER_ID, u.ERP_REPAIR_ORDER_NO, u.REPAIR_CHANN_ID, u.REPAIR_CHANN_NO, u.REPAIR_CHANN_NAME, u.AREA_ID, u.AREA_NO, u.AREA_NAME, to_char(u.REQ_FINISH_DATE,'yyyy-MM-DD') REQ_FINISH_DATE, u.STOREOUT_STORE_ID, u.STOREOUT_STORE_NO, u.STOREOUT_STORE_NAME, u.STORAGE_FLAG, u.REMARK, u.CRE_NAME, u.CREATOR, to_char(u.CRE_TIME,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') CRE_TIME, u.UPD_NAME, u.UPDATOR, to_char(u.UPD_TIME,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') UPD_TIME, u.DEPT_ID, u.DEPT_NAME, u.ORG_ID, u.ORG_NAME, u.LEDGER_ID, u.LEDGER_NAME, u.STATE, u.DEL_FLAG, u.SHIP_POINT_ID, u.SHIP_POINT_NAME, u.DELIVER_ADDR_ID, u.DELIVER_ADDR_NO, u.DELIVER_DTL_ADDR, c.AREA_SER_ID, c.AREA_SER_NO, c.AREA_SER_NAME from ERP_REPAIR_ORDER u left join BASE_CHANN c on u.REPAIR_CHANN_ID = c.CHANN_ID where u.ERP_REPAIR_ORDER_ID = #ERP_REPAIR_ORDER_ID#
sqlMap.sql: select u.REPAIR_ORDER_DTL_ID, u.ERP_REPAIR_ORDER_ID, u.PRD_ID, u.PRD_NO, u.PRD_NAME, u.PRD_SPEC, u.PRD_COLOR, u.BRAND, u.STD_UNIT, u.REPAIR_NUM, u.REPAIR_PRICE, u.REPAIR_AMOUNT, u.REPAIR_RESON, s.SPCL_TECH_FLAG, s.SPCL_TECH_ID, u.REPAIR_ATT, u.VOLUME, u.TOTAL_VOLUME, temp.SAFE_NUM, p.PAR_PRD_NAME, s.DM_SPCL_TECH_NO from ERP_REPAIR_ORDER_DTL u left join BASE_PRODUCT p on u.PRD_ID = p.PRD_ID left join DRP_SPCL_TECH s on u.SPCL_TECH_ID = s.SPCL_TECH_ID left join ERP_REPAIR_ORDER a on u.ERP_REPAIR_ORDER_ID = a.ERP_REPAIR_ORDER_ID left join ( select acct.store_id, acct.prd_id, (sum(NVL(acct.STORE_NUM, 0)) -sum( NVL(acct.FREEZE_NUM, 0))) SAFE_NUM from DRP_STORE_ACCT acct group by acct.PRD_ID,acct.STORE_ID) temp on u.PRD_ID = temp.PRD_ID and a.STOREOUT_STORE_ID = temp.STORE_ID
sqlMap.select: select sum(NVL(d.TOTAL_VOLUME,0)) TOTAL_VOLUME , sum(NVL(d.REPAIR_NUM,0))TOTAL_REPAIR_NUM, sum(NVL(d.REPAIR_AMOUNT,0))TOTAL_REPAIR_AMOUNT from ERP_REPAIR_ORDER_DTL d where d.ERP_REPAIR_ORDER_ID=#ERP_REPAIR_ORDER_ID# and d.DEL_FLAG=0
sqlMap.insert: insert into ERP_REPAIR_ORDER_DTL( REPAIR_ORDER_DTL_ID, ERP_REPAIR_ORDER_ID, REPAIR_ATT, REPAIR_RESON, PRD_COLOR, PRD_ID, PRD_NO, STD_UNIT, SPCL_TECH_ID, PRD_NAME, BRAND, PRD_SPEC, REPAIR_NUM, REPAIR_AMOUNT, REPAIR_PRICE, DEL_FLAG, VOLUME, TOTAL_VOLUME )values( #REPAIR_ORDER_DTL_ID#, #ERP_REPAIR_ORDER_ID#, #REPAIR_ATT#, #REPAIR_RESON#, #PRD_COLOR#, #PRD_ID#, #PRD_NO#, #STD_UNIT#, #SPCL_TECH_ID#, #PRD_NAME#, #BRAND#, #PRD_SPEC#, #REPAIR_NUM#, #REPAIR_AMOUNT#, #REPAIR_PRICE#, #DEL_FLAG#, #VOLUME#, #TOTAL_VOLUME# )
sqlMap.update:
update ERP_REPAIR_ORDER_DTL
REPAIR_ATT = #REPAIR_ATT# REPAIR_RESON = #REPAIR_RESON# PRD_COLOR = #PRD_COLOR# PRD_ID = #PRD_ID# PRD_NO = #PRD_NO# STD_UNIT = #STD_UNIT# SPCL_TECH_ID = #SPCL_TECH_ID# PRD_NAME = #PRD_NAME# BRAND = #BRAND# PRD_SPEC = #PRD_SPEC# REPAIR_AMOUNT = #REPAIR_AMOUNT# REPAIR_PRICE = #REPAIR_PRICE# REPAIR_NUM = #REPAIR_NUM# VOLUME = #VOLUME# TOTAL_VOLUME = #TOTAL_VOLUME#
where REPAIR_ORDER_DTL_ID = #REPAIR_ORDER_DTL_ID#
sqlMap.delete: update ERP_REPAIR_ORDER_DTL set DEL_FLAG = #DEL_FLAG# where REPAIR_ORDER_DTL_ID in ($REPAIR_ORDER_DTL_IDS$)
update ERP_REPAIR_ORDER_DTL set DEL_FLAG = #DEL_FLAG# where ERP_REPAIR_ORDER_ID = #ERP_REPAIR_ORDER_ID:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.select: Select AREA_ID, AREA_NO, AREA_NAME,CHANN_ID,CHANN_NO,CHANN_NAME from BASE_CHANN where CHANN_ID = #CHANN_ID#
Select AREA_ID, AREA_NO, AREA_NAME,CHANN_ID,CHANN_NO,CHANN_NAME from BASE_CHANN where CHANN_TYPE = #CHANN_TYPE# AND STATE= #STATE#
sqlMap.update:
update ${SYSSCHEMA}.ERP_REPAIR_ORDER
STATE = #STATE# UPDATOR = #UPDATOR# UPD_NAME = #UPD_NAME# SHIP_POINT_ID = #SHIP_POINT_ID# SHIP_POINT_NAME = #SHIP_POINT_NAME#
, UPD_TIME = sysdate where ERP_REPAIR_ORDER_ID = #ERP_REPAIR_ORDER_ID#
